web.auth.mfa_verification_required.en: MFA verification required to access your account
web.auth.mfa_verification_required.translation: Preverjanje MFA je potrebno za dostop do vašega računa

web.auth.security.authentication_failed.en: Authentication failed. Please verify your credentials and try again.
web.auth.security.authentication_failed.translation: Avtentikacija ni uspela. Preverite svoje poverilnice in poskusite znova.

web.auth.security.rate_limited.en: Too many attempts. Please try again later.

web.auth.security.session_expired.en: Session expired. Please log in again.
web.auth.security.session_expired.translation: Seja je potekla. Ponovno se prijavite.

web.auth.security.recovery_code_not_foun.en: Recovery code not found. Please verify you entered it correctly.
web.auth.security.recovery_code_not_foun.translation: Obnovitvene kode ni bilo mogoče najti. Preverite, ali ste jo pravilno vnesli.

web.auth.security.recovery_code_used.en: This recovery code has already been used. Each code can only be used once.
web.auth.security.recovery_code_used.translation: Ta obnovitvena koda je že bila uporabljena. Vsako kodo je mogoče uporabiti samo enkrat.

web.auth.security.network_error.en: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.
web.auth.security.network_error.translation: Napaka omrežja. Preverite svojo povezavo in poskusite znova.

web.auth.security.internal_error.en: An error occurred. Please try again.
web.auth.security.internal_error.translation: Prišlo je do napake. Poskusite znova.

web.auth.magicLink.description.en: We'll send you a secure login link
web.auth.magicLink.description.translation: Poslali vam bomo varno povezavo za prijavo

web.auth.magicLink.sentTo.en: We sent a login link to {email}
web.auth.magicLink.sentTo.translation: Poslali smo povezavo za prijavo na {email}

web.auth.magicLink.linkExpiresIn.en: This link will expire in 15 minutes
web.auth.magicLink.linkExpiresIn.translation: Ta povezava bo potekla čez 15 minut

web.auth.magicLink.noPasswordNeeded.en: No password needed — just click the link in your email
web.auth.magicLink.noPasswordNeeded.translation: Geslo ni potrebno — samo kliknite povezavo v svoji e-pošti

web.auth.magicLink.requestFailed.en: Failed to send login link. Please try again.
web.auth.magicLink.requestFailed.translation: Pošiljanje povezave za prijavo ni uspelo. Poskusite znova.

web.auth.magicLink.invalidLink.translation: Neveljavna ali manjkajoča povezava za prijavo

web.auth.magicLink.pleaseWait.en: Please wait while we verify your link
web.auth.magicLink.pleaseWait.translation: Počakajte, medtem ko preverjamo vašo povezavo

web.auth.webauthn.signIn.en: Sign in with Face ID / Touch ID
web.auth.webauthn.signIn.translation: Prijavite se s Face ID / Touch ID

web.auth.webauthn.notSupported.en: Biometric authentication is not supported in this browser
web.auth.webauthn.notSupported.translation: Biometrična avtentikacija ni podprta v tem brskalniku

web.auth.webauthn.requiresModernBrowser.en: Please use a modern browser that supports WebAuthn (Chrome, Safari, Firefox, or Edge)
web.auth.webauthn.requiresModernBrowser.translation: Uporabite sodoben brskalnik, ki podpira WebAuthn (Chrome, Safari, Firefox ali Edge)

web.auth.webauthn.setupFailed.en: Failed to set up biometric login

web.auth.webauthn.authFailed.en: Biometric authentication failed. Please try again.
web.auth.webauthn.authFailed.translation: Biometrična avtentikacija ni uspela. Poskusite znova.

web.auth.webauthn.description.en: Use your fingerprint, face, or security key to sign in
web.auth.webauthn.description.translation: Uporabite svoj prstni odtis, obraz ali varnostni ključ za prijavo

web.auth.webauthn.supportedMethods.en: Supports Face ID, Touch ID, Windows Hello, and security keys
web.auth.webauthn.supportedMethods.translation: Podpira Face ID, Touch ID, Windows Hello in varnostne ključe

web.auth.lockout.account_locked.en: Account locked due to too many failed login attempts
web.auth.lockout.account_locked.translation: Račun je zaklenjen zaradi preveč neuspelih poskusov prijave

web.auth.lockout.contact_support.en: Contact support if you need immediate access
web.auth.lockout.contact_support.translation: Kontaktirajte podporo, če potrebujete takojšen dostop

web.auth.lockout.try_password_reset.en: You can reset your password instead
web.auth.lockout.try_password_reset.translation: Namesto tega lahko ponastavite svoje geslo

web.auth.sessions.confirm_remove.en: Are you sure you want to remove this session?
web.auth.sessions.confirm_remove.translation: Ali ste prepričani, da želite odstraniti to sejo?

web.auth.sessions.confirm_remove_all.en: This will log you out from all other devices. Are you sure?
web.auth.sessions.confirm_remove_all.translation: To vas bo odjavilo iz vseh drugih naprav. Ali ste prepričani?

web.auth.sessions.removed_all_success.en: All other sessions have been logged out
web.auth.sessions.removed_all_success.translation: Vse druge seje so bile odjavljene

web.auth.mfa.setup_description.en: Add an extra layer of security to your account
web.auth.mfa.setup_description.translation: Dodajte dodatno raven varnosti svojemu računu

web.auth.mfa.scan_qr.en: Scan this QR code with your authenticator app
web.auth.mfa.scan_qr.translation: Skenirajte to QR kodo s svojo aplikacijo za avtentikacijo

web.auth.mfa.verify_code.en: Enter the 6-digit code from your app

web.auth.mfa.invalid_code.en: Invalid code. Codes expire every 30 seconds. Try the latest code from your authenticator app.
web.auth.mfa.invalid_code.translation: Neveljavna koda. Kode potečejo vsakih 30 sekund. Poskusite z najnovejšo kodo iz svoje aplikacije za avtentikacijo.

web.auth.mfa.password_reason.en: Confirm your identity to modify two-factor authentication settings
web.auth.mfa.password_reason.translation: Potrdite svojo identiteto za spreminjanje nastavitev dvofaktorske avtentikacije

web.auth.mfa.cancel.en: Cancel and return to sign in
web.auth.mfa.cancel.translation: Prekliči in vrni se na prijavo

web.auth.mfa.protected_description.en: Your account is protected with two-factor authentication
web.auth.mfa.protected_description.translation: Vaš račun je zaščiten z dvofaktorsko avtentikacijo

web.auth.mfa.enable_description.en: Protect your account with an additional layer of security
web.auth.mfa.enable_description.translation: Zaščitite svoj račun z dodatno ravnjo varnosti

web.auth.mfa.benefit_unauthorized.en: Prevent unauthorized access even if your password is compromised
web.auth.mfa.benefit_unauthorized.translation: Preprečite nepooblaščen dostop, tudi če je vaše geslo ogroženo

web.auth.mfa.benefit_apps.en: Works with Google Authenticator, Authy, and other TOTP apps
web.auth.mfa.benefit_apps.translation: Deluje z Google Authenticator, Authy in drugimi TOTP aplikacijami

web.auth.mfa.benefit_recovery.en: Backup recovery codes for emergency access
web.auth.mfa.benefit_recovery.translation: Varnostne obnovitvene kode za nujni dostop

web.auth.mfa.supported_apps.en: Use Google Authenticator, Authy, or any TOTP app
web.auth.mfa.supported_apps.translation: Uporabite Google Authenticator, Authy ali katero koli TOTP aplikacijo

web.auth.mfa.enter_code_description.en: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app
web.auth.mfa.enter_code_description.translation: Vnesite 6-mestno kodo iz svoje aplikacije za avtentikacijo

web.auth.mfa.enter_recovery_code.en: Enter one of your recovery codes

web.auth.mfa.otp_mode_active.translation: Način kode za avtentikacijo je aktiven

web.auth.mfa.enter_all_digits.en: Please enter all 6 digits to continue

web.auth.recovery_codes.description.en: Save these codes in a safe place. Each can be used once if you lose access to your authenticator.
web.auth.recovery_codes.description.translation: Shranite te kode na varno mesto. Vsako lahko uporabite enkrat, če izgubite dostop do svoje aplikacije za avtentikacijo.

web.auth.recovery_codes.warning.en: These codes will only be shown once
web.auth.recovery_codes.warning.translation: Te kode bodo prikazane samo enkrat

web.auth.recovery_codes.save_required.en: You must download or copy your recovery codes before completing setup.
web.auth.recovery_codes.save_required.translation: Preden dokončate nastavitev, morate prenesti ali kopirati svoje obnovitvene kode.

web.auth.recovery_codes.generate_new_war.en: This will invalidate all existing recovery codes
web.auth.recovery_codes.generate_new_war.translation: To bo razveljavilo vse obstoječe obnovitvene kode

web.auth.recovery_codes.copy_failed.en: Failed to copy codes to clipboard
web.auth.recovery_codes.copy_failed.translation: Kopiranje kod v odložišče ni uspelo

web.auth.recovery_codes.usage_hint.en: Each code can only be used once. Regenerate codes if you're running low.
web.auth.recovery_codes.usage_hint.translation: Vsako kodo lahko uporabite samo enkrat. Ponovno generirajte kode, če vam zmanjkuje.

web.auth.recovery_codes.generate_success.en: New recovery codes have been generated
web.auth.recovery_codes.generate_success.translation: Nove obnovitvene kode so bile generirane
